Curriculum Utility

Senior Design 2020-2021

Zach Coveno


My happy place is a warm beach with dogs (as shown in photo). I also love to play games (casual sports, board games, etc.) but my real dream is to coach football. During this remote schooling I have been able to help my old High School team out this spring which has been a lot of fun. Professionally I don't find myself exceptionally driven. I will be starting my career at Raytheon Techonologies in MA this summer, which will hopefully be a great springboard for me to find my professional niche.

Alex Broaddus


I grew up in Ashburn, VA, an area near Washington D.C. with so many data centers it's been coined the "bullseye of America's Internet". Biking is a huge part of my life. I've biked from Pittsburg to D.C. and I recently did a 400 mile loop in the beautiful state of Idaho. Post-graduation, I plan to make the first big move of my life to California and start a Software Engineering position at Google.

Kevin Deems


Growing up in Sarasota, Florida near the beach and nature trails, I love being outdoors and working out. Recently, I've been getting into paddle boarding and surfing and am taking a graduation trip across the West coast this summer. Professionally, I am set up to work in DevOps at The Vanguard Group and am passionate about networking and distributed systems.
